precondition: The "Write" application window is active and the main menu bar is visible.
action: Click the "File" menu item in the main menu bar.
expected_results: The "File" menu will expand, displaying a list of menu items.
A "Print" dialog box will appear, overlaying the document editing area.
The "Print" dialog box will close, and a "Now Printing" dialog box may appear.

precondition: The "Now Printing" dialog box is open.
expected_results: The "Now Printing" dialog box will close, and the print job will be canceled.
